definition: to sit/to take a seat/to take (a bus, airplane etc)/to bear fruit/variant of 座[zuo4]

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: This is due to the fact that Euler angles are always expressed relative to the global coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 这归咎于欧拉角总是以球坐标系表示。

sentences.english: Each Faculty is run by a Dean who coordinates the work of Departments.
sentences.chinese: 每个学院由一个坐标系系主任谁的工作部门。

sentences.english: Stability of an Iterative Dual-Doppler Wind Synthesis in Cartesian Coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 笛卡尔坐标系中迭代双多普勒风合成的稳定性。

sentences.english: The starting speed of particles in world space, along X, Y, and Z.
sentences.chinese: 粒子在世界坐标系内的开始速度，沿着X，Y和Z轴。

sentences.english: Select csys, datum point or location as the reference for entering offsets.
sentences.chinese: 选取坐标系，基准点或位置作为偏移的参考。

sentences.english: A dynamic model of landing gear struts is introduced in a non-inertial coordinate system.
sentences.chinese: 在非惯性坐标系中建立了起落架支柱的动力学模型。

sentences.english: The second thing is, well, we have to choose our favorite coordinate system to do this.
sentences.chinese: 第二步是，选择我们喜欢的坐标系去积分。

sentences.english: Well, we had here a picture in xy coordinates where we had our sides.
sentences.chinese: 我们所画的图是在xy坐标系内的，在这里我们可以。

sentences.english: What coordinates do we use to compute this integral?
sentences.chinese: 那用什么坐标系来计算这个积分呢？

sentences.english: OK, any questions about how to set up double integrals in xy coordinates?
sentences.chinese: 关于在xy坐标系里建立二重积分有问题吗？

sentences.english: OK, the right way to do this will be to integrate it in polar coordinates.
sentences.chinese: 这道题最合适的方法，应该在极坐标系里面计算。

sentences.english: This paper discussed the method of establishing local independent coordinate system through Ellipsoid transformation.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了应用椭球变换建立区域独立坐标系的方法。

sentences.english: Spatial references coordinate systems, projections, datums , ellipsoids –confusing?
sentences.chinese: 空间参考，坐标系，投影，椭球体。

sentences.english: Tensor algebra is tied to coordinates .
sentences.chinese: 张量代数则离不开坐标系。

sentences.english: A mechanical model for calculating the strength of the crank pin on pumping units is established by a rotary coordinate.
sentences.chinese: 采用动坐标系建立了曲柄销强度计算的力学模型。

sentences.english: Or I can use polar coordinates,and it works a little bit better that way.
sentences.chinese: 或者还是用极坐标系，这比直角坐标系更好。

definition: modulus (distance from the origin in polar coordinates)
